item.title: 伊石油与能源转让公司就阿根廷输油管道融资事宜进行谈判
item.description: 阿根廷原油钻探商 YPF SA 已与美国管道公司 Energy Transfer LP 举行会谈，为一条跨国管道融资，这条管道是南美国家加强页岩油出口雄心的关键。【原文：Argentine crude driller YPF SA has held talks with US pipeline company Energy Transfer LP to finance a cross-country conduit that’s key to the South American nation’s ambitions of ramping up shale oil exports.】

item.title: 奥克兰的预算缺口取决于体育馆体育场的出售
item.description: 如果官员们无法在未来六周内完成即将倒闭的奥克兰市职业体育馆的出售，那么加利福尼亚州奥克兰市将面临削减开支和停滞资本项目的风险。【原文：Oakland, California, risks having to slash spending and stall capital projects if officials are unable to close the sale of the city’s soon-to-be defunct pro-sports arena in the next six weeks.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金在 18 个月内任命第二位首席风险官
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）将普里蒂-辛格（Priti Singh）调任为首席风险官，接替任职仅一年半的贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board moved Priti Singh to chief risk officer, replacing a former BlackRock Inc. executive who had been in the role for only a year and a half.】

item.title: 结算投机将 XRP 推向加密货币反弹的前沿
item.description: 一种鲜为人知的加密货币正处于该行业一场关键法律斗争的中心，它引领了数字资产的最新涨势，因为人们猜测其背后的公司可能很快就会与美国监管机构达成和解。【原文：A little-known cryptocurrency that is at the center of a key legal fight for the industry is leading the latest rally in digital assets amid speculation that the company behind it may soon reach a settlement with US regulators.】

item.title: 贸易活动强劲，洛杉矶港集装箱吞吐量增长 14
item.description: 受旺季提前到来、消费者支出稳健以及东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸港口罢工威胁的影响，美国西海岸港口以强劲的贸易量结束了今年上半年的工作。【原文：US West Coast ports are closing out the first half of the year with strong trade volumes, boosted by an early peak season, solid consumer spending, and threats of a labor strike at East and Gulf Coast ports.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行称加拿大央行必须结束或修正量化紧缩政策
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）的策略师表示，加拿大央行需要结束其量化紧缩计划，或者解决短期资金市场的扭曲问题，因为这种扭曲导致实际利率持续走高。【原文：The Bank of Canada needs to wrap up its quantitative tightening program or fix distortions in short-term funding markets that are keeping effective interest rates higher, according to Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce strategists.】

item.title: 加拿大油区发生野火，威胁油砂开采
item.description: 自周二晚些时候以来，阿尔伯塔省各地爆发了新的失控野火，大火可能威胁到每天 40 多万桶的石油产量。【原文：New out-of-control wildfires have erupted across Alberta since late Tuesday, with blazes potentially threatening more than 400,000 barrels a day of oil production.】

item.title: 总统大选临近，交易员转投委内瑞拉石油债券
item.description: 在本月总统大选之前，委内瑞拉违约债券市场上出现了一种新的交易方式：购买国家石油公司的债务。【原文：A new trade is gaining steam in the market for Venezuela’s defaulted bonds ahead of this month’s presidential elections: Buying the debt of the state oil company.】

item.title: 道富出售优先股以加强回购力度
item.description: 就在其财务总监宣布加快股票回购步伐的前一天，道富公司（State Street Corp.【原文：State Street Corp. is offering a new series of preferred shares on Wednesday, just a day after its finance chief flagged a speed-up in the pace of its stock buybacks.】

item.title: 据说国泰君安正在探索创建稳定币、存款代币
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，金融服务和银行业巨头道富公司（State Street Corp.【原文：Financial services and banking giant State Street Corp. is exploring ways to get involved in settling payments on blockchain, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 因股价下跌，看跌英伟达期权交易当日净赚 600 万美元
item.description: 由于人工智能宠儿英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价暴跌，一名周二在期权市场上对英伟达公司下注的交易员似乎赚了 650 多万美元。【原文：A trader who bet against Nvidia Corp. in the options market Tuesday appears to have made more than $6.5 million as shares of the AI darling slumped.】

item.title: 埃及将结束夏季停电，液化天然气供应将带来缓解
item.description: 在政府确保能源供应以维持发电厂运行后，埃及将取消计划中的停电，直至夏末。【原文：Egypt will scrap scheduled power cuts until the end of the summer after the government secured energy supplies to keep power plants running.】

item.title: 特朗普计划有可能引发美国通胀，而美国共和党承诺结束通胀
item.description: 在本周的共和党全国代表大会上，一位又一位发言人将高通胀归咎于拜登政府。【原文：Speaker after speaker at the Republican National Convention this week has laid the blame for high inflation with the Biden administration.】

item.title: Blackstone 增加债券销售，帮助支付房地产投资信托基金收购费用
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正在扩大商业抵押债券的发行规模，这将有助于支付其斥资 100 亿美元收购公寓业主 AIR Communities 的部分费用。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is increasing the size of a commercial mortgage bond offering that will help pay for part of its $10 billion acquisition of apartment landlord AIR Communities.】

item.title: 护肤品公司 Rodan & Fields 计划重组，将控制权交给贷款人
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TPG 支持的护肤品公司 Rodan & Fields 正在商谈将公司控制权移交给债权人并获得新的现金。【原文：TPG-backed skincare company Rodan & Fields is in talks to hand control of the company to creditors and receive fresh cash, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 777 Partners 的伦敦雄狮篮球队面临债权人关闭
item.description: 陷入困境的投资公司 777 Partners 旗下的一支伦敦篮球队面临关闭的风险，该公司的法律诉讼得到了众多债权人的支持。【原文：A London basketball team owned by beleaguered investment firm 777 Partners risks closure in a legal action supported by a slew of creditors.】

item.title: 前高盛律师在内幕交易案中被判 28 个月监禁
item.description: 一名前高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. associate will spend 28 months behind bars after admitting to passing inside tips to friends while working at the investment bank and Blackstone Inc.】

item.title: 英特尔、GlobalFoundries 战胜政策担忧引发的芯片市场低迷
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.）和全球半导体公司（Globalfoundries Inc.【原文：Intel Corp. and Globalfoundries Inc. rallied Wednesday, defying a broad selloff among chip companies, as investors speculated the two could benefit from fresh policies under either a Biden or Trump administration.】

item.title: 精打细算的购物者给美股大涨带来风险
item.description: 股市接近历史高点。今年的落后股也加入了涨势。就连小市值股票也开始发力。【原文：Stocks are near all-time highs. The year’s laggards are joining in on the rally. Even small caps are having a moment.】

item.title: 斯塔默计划修改法律，简化英国与欧盟规则的接轨程序
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的政府计划修改英国法律，使其更容易与欧盟的产品标准接轨。【原文：Keir Starmer’s government plans to change UK law to make it easier to align with product standards in the European Union, a significant shift in approach included in the King’s Speech setting out the legislative agenda.】

item.title: 高盛集团鲁布纳表示 "不买跌势"，因为调整已经开始
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）战术策略师斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）警告说，"我不买跌势"。【原文：The S&P 500 Index has nowhere to go from here but down according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. tactical strategist Scott Rubner who cautions “I am not buying the dip.”】

item.title: 抵押贷款机构面临自动估值模型的规则检查
item.description: 住房抵押贷款机构必须符合一套新的标准，以确保其技术评估流程不会出现可能产生错误估算或歧视借款人的缺陷。【原文：Home mortgage lenders will have to meet a new set of standards designed to ensure that their tech-fueled evaluation processes don’t build in flaws that might produce faulty estimates or discriminate against borrowers.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利任命莫-阿索穆尔为投资银行业务联席主管
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在调整其投资银行业务的高层，为交易和借贷市场的全面复苏做好准备。【原文：Morgan Stanley is reshuffling the top ranks of its investment-banking business to set up for what it sees as a full-blown revival in dealmaking and borrowing markets.】

item.title: 英国电信意大利部门据称将吸引 Asterion 和 Nextalia 的兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Asterion Industrial Partners 和 Nextalia Sgr 是英国电信集团陷入困境的意大利分公司的潜在竞购者之一。【原文：Private equity firms Asterion Industrial Partners and Nextalia Sgr are among potential bidders for BT Group Plc’s troubled Italian arm, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 贷款发放机构在等待美联储的同时自行降息
item.description: 杠杆贷款发行商正在利用投资者的强烈需求，推动计提准备金，以降低未来的借贷成本，并在美联储继续提高利率的情况下为他们提供缓冲。【原文：Leveraged loan issuers are capitalizing on strong investor demand to push for provisions that would lower their future borrowing costs and give them a buffer if the Federal Reserve keeps interest rates elevated.】

item.title: 主要交易所的加密代币上市量已超过去年全年总量
item.description: 今年上半年在主要数字资产交易所上市的新代币数量超过了 2023 年全年的数量，这是加密货币重新流行的另一个迹象。【原文：In another sign that crypto is back in vogue, more new tokens have been listed on major digital-asset exchanges in the first half of this year than in all of 2023.】

item.title: 贝莱德利用蓝筹债券市场为收购 Preqin 提供资金
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：A unit of BlackRock Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade bond market on Wednesday to help fund a portion of the firm’s $3.2 billion acquisition of private-markets data business Preqin.】

item.title: 特斯拉早期支持者发起基金，关注马斯克的 xAI 和 SpaceX
item.description: 罗恩-巴伦（Ron Baron）是特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Ron Baron, an early backer of Tesla Inc., is deepening his embrace of Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk by setting up partnerships that would permit clients to invest in two of the billionaire’s private ventures.】

item.title: 格拉梅西称世界上风险最高的债务 "易得之财已不复存在
item.description: Gramercy Funds Management 正在转向新兴市场评级最高的借款人的债务，因为世界上一些风险最高的国家的债券看起来不那么吸引人了。【原文：Gramercy Funds Management is turning to debt from top-rated borrowers in emerging markets as bonds from some of the riskiest countries in the world look less appealing.】

item.title: 关键天然气贸易的崩溃表明美国供应严重过剩
item.description:
得克萨斯州一家大型工厂的停工影响了燃料的出口。【原文：

An outage at a major Texas plant has dented exports of the fuel.

】
